prompt:
Nurse: Great, Mr. Valenzuela. Here are a couple of tips that might make the bowel prep easier for you. You can drink the laxative solution cold, which some people find makes it more palatable. You can also drink the solution through a straw to help it go down easier. What do you think about these tips?

Patient: Yeah. And it sounds good.

Nurse: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. These tips can make the process a bit more comfortable. Do you have any questions about the bowel prep or anything else you'd like to discuss?

Patient: No. I don't think so.

Nurse: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. The last part of your prep is to stop eating and drinking everything before your procedure. You will need to finish your laxative solution and stop everything 4 hours before your procedure. Do you have any questions about this or anything else you'd like to discuss?

Patient: No. I don't think so?

Nurse: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm glad to hear that you're clear on the instructions. Remember, we're here to support you every step of the way. If you have any questions or concerns at any point, don't hesitate to reach out. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss today?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: Great, Mr. Valenzuela. I've shared a lot of info with you today, so I wanted to pause and ask if you have any questions about anything we've discussed so far, or if there's anything else you'd like to review?
responses.our_model: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. I know I've shared a lot of information with you, but we're almost done. I just have a couple more questions for you. Before we continue, do you have any questions or is there anything you'd like to discuss?
